conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true cutaway 3D model with extruded walls, visible thickness, and an angled/isometric viewpoint exposing interior volumes.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear wall height/thickness and readable room volumes; clean cutaway. Minor simplifications at some wall tops/corners and slight perspective/scale stylization.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall 2-bed + living/dining core + kitchen/utility + 2 toilets layout matches well with correct general adjacencies. Some proportional differences (room/balcony depths) and a few partition/door positions appear simplified relative to the 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture present (2 beds, sofa set, dining, kitchen counters, bathroom fixtures). Furniture generally placed in correct rooms; minor scale/orientation simplifications.

visual_clarity.notes: Geometry is clear and readable with consistent materials; lighting is adequate. Some openings/frames and thin elements lack detail, reducing structural clarity slightly.

detected_errors.description: Minor proportional/layout deviations vs the 2D plan (notably balcony/deck depths and a few internal partition lengths).
Some door/window placements and opening sizes appear simplified and may not exactly match the 2D plan locations.
Rendering uses simplified components (frames/rails/door swings) which slightly reduces precision verification of openings.

summary: A true 3D cutaway conversion with strong overall plan fidelity, with only minor proportional and opening-placement simplifications compared to the 2D layout.
